title: Are There Any Restrictions on the Size, Format, or Resolution of a File to Be Attached to a Multimedia  Message?
answer:
> The maximum size of an audio or video file to be attached to a multimedia message is   

300 KB.   

> If a picture is too large, it will be automatically compressed before it is attached to a   

multimedia message. As a result, the resolution of the picture attached to the message   

decreases.
